dcterms:creator: K. J. Piczak
dcterms:description: The audio dataset consists of 1 to 5-second-long recordings organized into 14 classes with 40 examples per class, including thunderstorm, glass breaking, siren, car horn, barking dog, door wood knock, door wood creaks, crying baby, sneezing, clapping, coughing, laughing, female scream, and male scream, collected from ESC-50.
dcterms:title: ESC-50

dcterms:creator: I. Trowitzsch
J. Taghia
Y. Kashef
K. Obermayer
dcterms:description: The audio dataset consists of 1 to 5-second-long recordings organized into 14 classes with 40 examples per class, including thunderstorm, glass breaking, siren, car horn, barking dog, door wood knock, door wood creaks, crying baby, sneezing, clapping, coughing, laughing, female scream, and male scream, collected from ESC-50 and NIGENS dataset.
dcterms:title: NIGENS

dcterms:description: The dataset used to train YOLO is gathered through the search engines like Google and manually adding some pictures of objects in the real-world environment. We tried to identify candidates of fear-causing sources in an indoor environment, and the final classes were chosen as dog, window, human, door, and television.
dcterms:title: Custom dataset for YOLO training
